scripts.build-transform-light: npx token-transformer tokens.json tokens/light.json global,light,theme global
scripts.build-transform-dark: npx token-transformer tokens.json tokens/dark.json global,dark,theme global
scripts.build-transform-typography-default: npx token-transformer tokens.json tokens/typography-default.json global,typography-default,theme global
scripts.build-transform: npm run build-transform-light && npm run build-transform-dark && npm run build-transform-typography-default
scripts.build: npm run build-transform && npm run build-sd && npm run build-tw
